item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I guess I just expected more of him, which was my mistake. I think, in time, he'll come to regret that cover.
item.content:encoded: I guess I just expected more of him, which was my mistake. I think, in time, he’ll come to regret that cover.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i agree about the lack of class, but pop stars rarely adhere to social constructs. even the well-educated ones.
item.content:encoded: i agree about the lack of class, but pop stars rarely adhere to social constructs. even the well-educated ones.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Given the amount of touring he's done in the past couple years, I too am impressed with the shape he's in and he's no spring chicken. I just think the photo is rather déclassé. I expect something like that from the Chili Peppers, not a dapper and sophisticated Morrissey.
item.content:encoded:
Given the amount of touring he’s done in the past couple years, I too am impressed with the shape he’s in and he’s no spring chicken.
I just think the photo is rather déclassé. I expect something like that from the Chili Peppers, not a dapper and sophisticated Morrissey.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: it doesn't bother me at all. it's not like it's a duet with korn or fall out boy. and he's in pretty damn good shape for his age. i say kudos.
item.content:encoded: it doesn’t bother me at all. it’s not like it’s a duet with korn or fall out boy. and he’s in pretty damn good shape for his age. i say kudos.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Seriously? I thought for sure you'd be writing The Moz off right under Robert Smith for such an embarrassing act.
item.content:encoded: Seriously? I thought for sure you’d be writing The Moz off right under Robert Smith for such an embarrassing act.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i kind of thought it was ballsy. intended.
item.content:encoded: i kind of thought it was ballsy. intended.

item.title: By: Arthur Seaton
item.dc:creator: Arthur Seaton
item.description:
When I saw this on Pitchfork, I wondered if it would get Drawer B exposure.
I liked this better when the RHCP did it with socks. I feel bad for that guy second from the right. He looks like he's trying to hide. And why is Moz fiddling with his hair when he has a record on his dick? Very odd.
item.content:encoded:
When I saw this on Pitchfork, I wondered if it would get Drawer B exposure.

I liked this better when the RHCP did it with socks. I feel bad for that guy second from the right. He looks like he’s trying to hide. And why is Moz fiddling with his hair when he has a record on his dick? Very odd.
